thread.title: Crash of Horse Carriage in Manhattan’s Central Park Renews Calls for Curbs

author: Mike Vilensky
title: Crash of Horse Carriage in Manhattan’s Central Park Renews Calls for Curbs
text:
A runaway carriage horse that left three passengers injured on a busy Manhattan street has revived a debate over restricting the iconic New York City rides.

The incident happened on Sunday after a pedestrian opened and closed an umbrella that spooked the horse that was pulling a carriage with three passengers from Texas, according to the carriage driver and a New York Police Department spokesman. The horse bolted into Central Park South, wedging itself between two parked cars. The passengers were treated for minor injuries...
